categories.name: Essential
categories.description: Necessary for the website to function correctly. These cannot be disabled.

cookies.name: uksfta_consent
cookies.purpose: Stores the user's cookie consent preferences.

cookies.name: uksf_auth
cookies.purpose: Stores authentication status for authorized personnel.

categories.name: Analytics
categories.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

cookies.name: _ga, _gid
cookies.purpose: Used by Google Analytics to distinguish users and throttle request rate.

categories.name: Marketing & Ads
categories.description: Used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.

cookies.name: ads_data
cookies.purpose: Used for personalized advertising and tracking user behavior across Google services.

categories.name: Functional
categories.description: Enable advanced features such as live server status feeds and social media integrations.

cookies.name: bm_sz, __cf_bm
cookies.purpose: Used by Battlemetrics to manage bot traffic and ensure service stability for live feeds.
